summary: Down on his luck and working in a Mexican restaurant in Australia, an American tourist is hired by a icy heiress to pose as an obnoxious new boyfriend in an attempt to make her father accept her current boyfriend.
cast: Cheech Marin|Emma Samms|Vernon Wells|Bruce Spence|Carole Davis|Terence Cooper|Jeanette Cronin|Gary McCormick|Frank Whitten|June Bishop|David Argue|Bruce Allpress|Val Lamond|Claire Glenister|Jonathan Coleman|Suzanne Chamberlain|Richard Hanna|Noel Appleby|Eric Liddy|Doug Aston|Leticia Bridges|Wendy Petrie|Daryl Maguire|Dennis O'Keefe|Brian Gidley|Neill Gladwin|Stephen Kearney|Herbs|Hattie St. John|Alan Farquhar|Kim Buchanan|Tracey Allen|Joel Tobeck|Kurt De Koster|Mike Finlayson|Ken George|Michael Morrissey
keywords: woman in bra and skirt|sexist joke|pretending to be someone else|ethnic stereotype|blackface
title: The Shrimp on the Barbie
